DataElementConcept.preferredName: Nervous System Findings Domain Speech Language Assessment

ValueDomain.preferredName: Normal Abnormal Unknown Not Tested Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm._Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm._Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused._Indicates that a test was not performed._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that a test was not performed.
